replies.bodyText:
Will leave as a string, these are as-is from the documentation and are supplied to the keystore as Strings -- that's Android's API. Having these as enums means conversion between types...(enum -> string). Since this isn't public API, I'm inclined to leave as-is
See:
https://developer.android.com/training/articles/keystore#SupportedSignatures
